attributes.action: We wanted to that government change the law vote on over 16 and 17 years old
attributes.additional_details: There are over 1.5 millions 16 and 17 years olds in the uk denied the vote. The government must change the law and our young people’s voice must be heard
attributes.background: We wanted to tell the government to law for young people to vote. At the moment  currently teen age under 18 are not allowed to vote in any elections. The government must allow for teen age over 16 to vote
